ai-patthana8.47:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.47:1.1_0: Not for the sake of grasping ...
ai-patthana8.47:2.1_0: Not grasping does not give rise to the teaching, or cause conditioned by not grasping.
ai-patthana8.47:2.1_1: Not grasping arises dependent on the teaching, not for the sake of those who don’t give rise to the cause.
ai-patthana8.47:2.1_2: and thoughts don’t arise because of not grasping. Since they don’t arise because of a cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.47:3.1_0: Not for grasping, and for the sake of not grasping, you don’t give rise to a cause of because of grasping.
ai-patthana8.47:4.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana8.47:5.1_0: The group of twelve on large teeth is finished.
